::Megatron's Base::

The computer that DarkMouse set up initiates defence sequence.
Computer:: Systems detect unauthorized Pred signatures.  Autoguns 
ready.  Target sighted and locked on. Fire!

The computer systems have the defence autoguns around the ship fire 
on Megastorm.

his
